message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. How about $130? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I really appreciate your product, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses low. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
